attributes.action: Remove all gyms from prisons. Hard-working people who obey the law can't afford them so people who commit crime shouldn't be allowed them for free.
attributes.additional_details: People who commit crime and get put in jail are given free access to gyms.  Lots of people who obey the law and work hard cannot afford these and they should be viewed as a luxury.  If they want to get fit they can still use exercise yards.
